Title: Mile Deep and a Foot Wide
Plot: Heylia treats Nancy like the trash that she thinks she is. Peter's captain looks over his notes on the DEA bust. Celia and Doug's relationship hasn't changed since last week. Andy's ex-girlfriend, Kat, shows up.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Joe Zymblosky, Eric Cadora, Eden Sher, Andy Milder, Bob Rumnock, Jack Stehlin, Martin Donovan, Allie Grant, Zooey Deschanel
